description:
The Buff Original EcoStretch Neckwear Banff is a multifunctional accessory that can be worn in more than 12 different ways. It is made of recycled polyester and spandex, which are eco-friendly and flexible materials.

  • It has a sun protection factor of UPF 50, which protects the skin from harmful UV rays
  • It is a special edition for the Banff Mountain Film & Book Festival World Tour, which is a celebration of adventure and mountain culture
  • It features a colorful design inspired by the landscapes and wildlife of Banff National Park in Canada
name: Buff Original EcoStretch Neckwear Banff - Unisex
